description: Enlarged dormer extension, removal of 1no. Sheffield stand, provision of new cycle parking, installation of condensing units, external lighting, installation of an illuminated fascia sign to the new Old Street entrance, and associated alterations.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p>The maximum lux level permitted within the the proposed illuminated advertisement hereby approved, shall be no greater than 300cd/m2 in the hours of darkness. During the daylight hours, the luminance shall be controlled by sensors and/or timers to reflect ambient light conditions. At all times the display shall operate within that recommended by the Institution of Lighting Professional in its Professional Lighting Guide 05 (PLG 05) Brightness of Illuminated Advertisement (or its equivalent in a replacement guide).</p><p>REASON: To safeguard the amenity of the area and pedestrian and highway safety in the locality.</p>

<p>"The noise rating level of the condensing units hereby approved shall not exceed a level of 5dB(A) below the measured background noise level (LA90) at the nearest noise-sensitive receptor when assessed in accordance with BS4142:2014+A1:2019 (or any subsequent amendments or superseding standard).</p><p>The approved units shall thereafter be maintained in accordance with the manufacturer’s specifications, and no modifications shall be made that would increase their noise output.</p><p>Reason: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring occupiers and ensure compliance with Hackney Local Plan Policy LP2 and BS4142:2014+A1:2019."</p>
